title: Edward Albee’s Loft Tops a List of High-Profile Deals in October
description: The playwright’s longtime TriBeCa home sold for about $5.6 million, and two other sales brought in more than $50 million each, but not in the same building.
dc:creator: Vivian Marino
media:credit: Karsten Moran for The New York Times
media:description: A duplex on the 74th and 75th floors of 111 West 57th Street, a.k.a. Steinway Tower, sold for $50.5 million.
